TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectionsZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone

summary.span: 提供使用者介面 (UI)，可讓使用者在 和位於 區域的其他伺服器控制項之間建立連接。

span.span: Provides a user interface (UI) that enables users to form connections between and other server controls that reside in zones.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 Web 組件控制項集合，您可以啟用兩個伺服器控制項，來建立連接並共用資料，做為提供者，而另一個做為資料的取用者的其中一個控制項。Using the Web Parts control set, you can enable two server controls to form a connection and share data, with one control acting as the provider, and the other acting as the consumer of the data. 可以是兩個控制項控制項或任何其他類型的伺服器控制項，提供它們設計用來處理連線，而且它們會位於區域。The two controls can be controls or any other type of server control, provided that they are designed to handle connections, and that they are residing in a zone. 若要深入了解 Web 組件連接，請參閱並類別的概觀，以及[Web 組件連接概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b)。To learn more about Web Parts connections, see the and class overviews, as well as [Web Parts Connections Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b). 提供必要的控制及條件存在之 Web 組件連接，就仍然必須實際連接控制項。Provided that the requisite controls and conditions exist to form a Web Parts connection, it is still necessary to actually connect the controls. 有三種伺服器控制項之間建立連接： 宣告在網頁上的連接、 程式碼中，建立連線，或是加入控制項至頁面，讓使用者可以連線需求上的控制項。There are three ways to form a connection between server controls: declaring a connection in a Web page, creating a connection in code, or adding a control to the page so that users can connect the controls on demand. 控制項產生 UI，可讓使用者連線或中斷連線的任何伺服器控制項在網頁上符合所需之連接的條件。The control generates a UI that enables users to connect or disconnect any server controls on a page that meet the conditions necessary to form a connection. 它是選擇性的控制項不需要建立連接，但在您要讓使用者控制的伺服器控制項已連線或中斷連線的情況下很有用。It is an optional control that is not necessary to form connections, but is useful in the case where you want to give users control over which server controls are connected or disconnected. 控制項是其中一個 Web 組件 工具區域的控制項繼承自基底類別。The control is one of the Web Parts tool zone controls that inherit from the base class. 為工具區域，控制設計成會顯示只有當其網頁處於特定顯示模式。As a tool zone, the control is designed to be visible only when its Web page is in a certain display mode. 在此情況下，名為的顯示模式連接模式 (的頁面是在此模式時頁面上的控制項具有其屬性值設定為)。In this case, the display mode is named connect mode (a page is in this mode when the control on the page has its property value set to ). 使用者切換成連接模式的頁面之後，他們必須點按連接動詞命令功能表中的動詞命令的其中一個伺服器控制項，並接著連接 UI 會變成可見。After users switch a page into connect mode, they must click a connect verb on the verbs menu of one of the server controls, and then the connection UI becomes visible. 為 Web 組件區域控制項控制項是一種區域 (繼承自類別) 設計為包含其他控制項。As a Web Parts zone control, the control is a type of zone (which inherits from the class) designed to contain other controls. 一般情況下，區域與其他 Web 組件的工具區域中有大部分相同的項目： 標頭、 內文 或 內容 區域中和頁尾。In general, a zone has most of the same elements as other Web Parts tool zones: a header, a body or contents area, and a footer. Web 組件區域，以及區域的不同部分的完整討論，請參閱類別概觀。For a complete discussion of what a Web Parts zone is, and the different parts of a zone, see the class overview. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不同於大部分其他的 Web 組件區域中，是很重要的一點區域未包含與其相關聯的伺服器控制項的唯一的型別。Unlike most other Web Parts zones, it is important to note that a zone does not contain a unique type of server control associated with it. 如需區域和所包含的控制項相關聯的清單，請參閱中的圖表類別概觀。For a list of zones and the associated controls they contain, see the chart in the class overview. 但是區域未包含控制項。But the zone does not contain controls. 相反地，它是非常有限的目的為提供使用者連線或中斷連線的某些現有的伺服器控制項的 UI頁面上的區域。Instead, it serves a very limited purpose of providing a UI for users to connect or disconnect server controls that exist in some zone on the page. 唯一的控制項中包含控制是標準的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，它會產生其 UI 建立連接的一部分。The only controls contained in a control are the standard ASP.NET server controls that it generates as part of its UI for forming connections. 當呈現控制項，它會產生根據網頁上所能建立連接的伺服器控制項的 UI。When the control is rendered, it generates a UI based on the server controls on the page that are capable of forming connections. 控制項可讓您決定哪一部伺服器中的控制項區域頁面，提供者，取用者，哪一個連接點可供使用，而且伺服器控制項目前是否已連線或中斷連接，然後據以產生 UI。The control determines which server controls in the zone on the page are providers, which are consumers, which connection points are available, and whether the server controls are currently connected or disconnected, and then it generates the UI accordingly. 例如，假設有一個控制項能夠提供者，一控制能夠取用者，在宣告它們在頁面上，和目前已中斷連接。For example, suppose there is one control capable of being a provider, one control capable of being a consumer, they are declared in a on the page, and they are currently disconnected. 當使用者切換到連線模式的頁面，並按一下 connect 動詞命令，在其中一個控制項，控制項產生的 UI，按一下時，顯示的表單中哪些使用者可以選擇選項，以建立連接的連結。When a user switches the page to connect mode and clicks the connect verb on one of the controls, the control generates a UI with a link that, when clicked, displays a form in which users can choose options to create a connection. （如果先前已連線的控制項，初始檢視改為使用者提供按鈕，以中斷連接的控制項）。(If the controls were previously connected, the initial view instead presents users with a button to disconnect the controls). 連接 UI 中用於建立新的連線，使用者會顯示哪些控制項是為提供者，以及哪一個控制項是取用者。In the connection UI for creating new connections, users are shown which control is a provider, and which control is a consumer. 以下每個伺服器控制項，列出可用的下拉式清單控制項出現控制項的物件。A drop-down list control appears below each server control, listing the available objects for the control. 從個別的下拉式清單中，使用者必須選取其中一個物件 （用來判斷哪些介面和資料會與取用者共用） 的提供者，和一個每個取用者的物件 (若要判斷哪些介面和資料會使用取用者），將會連接到提供者。From the respective drop-down lists, users must select one object for the provider (to determine what interface and data will be shared with consumers), and one object for each consumer (to determine what interface and data the consumer will consume) that will be connected to the provider. > [!NOTE] > 在 Web 組件控制集預設實作，一個提供者可以連線至許多取用者，但取用者可以有只有一個提供者。In the Web Parts control set default implementation, one provider can connect to many consumers, but a consumer can have only one provider. 若要使用控制項，您可以將它宣告內`
`在 Web 上的項目頁面上 （但未巢狀在另一個 Web 組件區域項目），使用``元素，或者您可以將它新增至頁面以程式設計的方式。To use the control, you can declare it within the `` element on a Web page (but not nested within another Web Parts zone element), using the `` element, or you can add it to the page programmatically. 如果您宣告的項目在頁面中，不同於其他 Web 組件的區域，您無法宣告任何其他類型的伺服器控制項的標記之間``項目。If you declare the element in a page, unlike the other Web Parts zones, you cannot declare any other type of server controls between the tags of the `` element. 您可以宣告中它自己的屬性和樣式的詳細資訊，與相關的項目，但它是獨立元素，並不是樣板控制項內的其他伺服器控制項宣告。You can declare elements within it that relate to its own properties and style details, but it is a standalone element and is not a template control within which other server controls can be declared. > [!NOTE] > 若要改善協助工具，內呈現控制項`
`項目。To improve accessibility, the control is rendered within a `
` element. `
`項目群組相關之控制項集合中用來建立連線控制項，並幫助 （例如，一般的網頁瀏覽器） 這兩個視覺化使用者代理程式在這些控制項之間的索引標籤式瀏覽和（例如，螢幕讀取軟體） 的語音導向的使用者代理程式。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for establishing connections in the control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). 控制項有許多屬性，它會使用連接 UI 的呈現。The control has a number of properties it uses for rendering the connection UI. 一組屬性包含數個動詞命令-只能以連接 UI 中執行動作，使用： ， ，和。One set of properties includes several verbs--used only in relation to connections--that carry out actions in the UI: , , and . 大量的屬性，特別是用於連接區域 UI，是由 UI 中顯示的不同位置 （或在某些情況下，例如發生錯誤時） 的文字字串所組成： ， ， ， ， , , , , , , , , , , , , , ， ，和。A large set of properties, used especially for the connections zone UI, consists of text strings displayed at various places (or in certain situations, such as when errors occur) in the UI: , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , and . 類別也包含許多其他 Web 組件區域中的通用屬性： ， ， ， ， ， ，以及。The class also contains a number of common properties found in other Web Parts zones: , , , , , , and . 最後，屬性是唯一的類別，參考之控制項的初始連線 (這是在其中使用者會按一下 connect 中的動詞命令功能表中，這也是控制項中所參考其動詞命令的控制項控制項屬性)。Finally, the property is unique to the class, referencing the control that initiates the connection (this is the control on which the user clicks the connect verb in its verbs menu, which is also the control referenced in the control's property). 類別也有多種方法，全部都是繼承和覆寫來自基底類別，而其中大部分來自基底的 Web 組件區域類別。The class also has a number of methods, all of which are inherited and overridden from base classes, and most of them come from the base Web Parts zone classes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱個別的方法。For details, see the individual methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用Web 組件頁面上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control on a Web Parts page. 此範例包含四個部分：The example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. - 包含郵遞區號介面和兩個的程式碼的原始程式檔控制項做為提供者和取用者連接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 網頁上裝載的所有控制項，示範如何宣告``項目，並設定一些屬性，連接上區域以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。A Web page that hosts all the controls, demonstrates how to declare an `` element, and sets a number of properties on the connections zone declaratively and programmatically. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 此程式碼範例的第一個部分是可讓使用者切換顯示模式，在網頁上的使用者控制項。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to switch display modes on a Web page. For 詳細資料會顯示在此控制項模式和原始碼的描述，請參閱[逐步解說：變更顯示模式，在 Web 組件頁面](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 此範例的第二個部分是以介面和自訂控制項的原始程式檔。The second part of the example is the source file with the interface and custom controls. 請注意，`ZipCodeWebPart`控制實作`IZipCode`介面，加入`ConnectionProvider`屬性，讓控制項可以做為連線提供者。Notice that the `ZipCodeWebPart` control implements the `IZipCode` interface, adding a `ConnectionProvider` attribute so that the control can act as a provider for a connection. `WeatherWebPart`控制項已標示為的方法`ConnectionConsumer`屬性，它會取用的地方`IZipCode`介面，以便它可以做為連接之中消費者。The `WeatherWebPart` control has a method marked with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute, where it consumes the `IZipCode` interface, so it can act as a consumer in a connection. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此範例會使用動態編譯。This example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說：開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 範例程式碼的第三個部分是網頁。The third part of the example code is the Web page. 頁面頂端附近`Register`使用者控制項，並連接中使用的自訂控制項的指示詞。Near the top are `Register` directives for the user control and the custom controls used in the connection. <`asp:connectionszone>`做為範例使用的頁面中宣告的項目以宣告方式控制。An <`asp:connectionszone>` element is declared in the page as an example of using the control declaratively. 在項目，是以宣告方式設定屬性的數目。Within the element, a number of properties are set declaratively. 中以程式設計方式設定連接區域上的其他屬性`

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您宣告，此預設建構函式的呼叫``ASP.NET 網頁中的項目。This default constructor is called when you declare the `` element in an ASP.NET page. 您不需要以隱含方式呼叫這個建構函式，除了在其中您會將控制項加入至頁面以程式設計方式的情況下。You do not need to implicitly call this constructor, except in cases where you are adding the control to the page programmatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式建立的新執行個體控制項，以程式設計方式加入至網頁。The following code example demonstrates the use of the constructor to create a new instance of a control to add to a Web page programmatically. 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用建構函式; 的網頁如需其他兩個程式碼所需執行此範例，請參閱範例 > 一節中的檔案類別概觀。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the constructor; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含郵遞區號介面和兩個的程式碼的原始程式檔控制項做為提供者和取用者連接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 裝載的所有控制項的網頁並在其`Page_Init`方法，會使用建構函式建立的新執行個體控制，並將它新增至頁面。A Web page that hosts all the controls and, in its `Page_Init` method, uses the constructor to create a new instance of the control and add it to the page. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 在網頁上，在`Page_Init`方法中，新控制已建立 （使用建構函式），並加入至頁面。On the Web page, in the `Page_Init` method, a new control is created (using the constructor) and added to the page. 當使用者的連線模式設定的頁面位置，然後按一下 connect 上的動詞命令的其中一個控制項，控制項就會出現。When a user sets the page to connect mode and clicks the connect verb on one of the controls, a control appears. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_ctor/CS/connectionZoneCtorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_ctor/VB/connectionZoneCtorVB.aspx#1)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**ZIP 程式碼提供者**控制項，然後按一下 connect 動詞命令。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 連接 UI 隨即出現，並因為連接已在頁面標記中宣告的控制項已連接。The connection UI appears, and the controls are already connected because the connection was declared in the markup of the page.

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that enables end users to cancel the process of establishing a connection.

value.span: ，讓使用者取消連接兩個控制項的程序。

span.span: A that enables end users to cancel the process of connecting two controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取消動詞命令，可搭配控制項，會將其連接使用者介面 (UI) 中顯示為檢視的一部分中哪些使用者在選取 連接點之控制項的區域層次動詞命令。The cancel verb, as used with a control, is a zone-level verb that appears in the connection user interface (UI) as part of the view in which users select connection points for the controls. 當使用者按一下取消動詞命令時，它會取消選取 連接點的程序的連線，並傳回連接區域檢視至超連結，使用者可以按一下以建立新的連線。When users click the cancel verb, it cancels the process of selecting connection points, and returns the connections zone view to the hyperlinks that users can click to establish a new connection. 使用屬性來取得對應的參考在 UI 中的物件。Use the property to get a reference to the corresponding object in the UI. 雖然屬性本身是唯讀的，有動詞命令的參考之後，您可以視需要變更其屬性值。Although the property itself is read-only, after you have a reference to the verb, you can change its property values as needed. 您可以藉由宣告，以宣告方式，設定取消動詞命令的屬性值``內的標記項目``項目。You can set the property values of the cancel verb declaratively, by declaring the `` element within the tags of an `` element. 動詞命令的屬性可以宣告方式設定形式`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是屬性物件 (例如`CancelVerb-Text`)。The properties of the verb can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `CancelVerb-Text`). 您也可以設定屬性以程式設計方式在表單`Property.Subproperty`(例如`CancelVerb.Text`)。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelVerb.Text`). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性與控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性; 的網頁如需其他兩個程式碼所需執行此範例，請參閱範例 > 一節中的檔案類別概觀。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含郵遞區號介面和兩個的程式碼的原始程式檔控制項做為提供者和取用者連接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 網頁上裝載的所有控制項，會宣告``項目，並示範如何使用屬性，以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 網頁會宣告``項目，以及在項目，它會宣告``項目，並設定一些使用屬性的屬性。The Web page declares an `` element, and within the element, it declares a `` element and sets some properties using attributes. 此外，在`Page_PreRender`方法中，程式碼會設定某些屬性上的取消動詞命令控制項。Also, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code sets some properties on the cancel verb for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**ZIP 程式碼提供者**控制項，然後按一下 connect 動詞命令。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 按一下 [**結束連線**中斷連線的控制項，因為在頁面上的宣告式連線已連線] 按鈕。Click the **End Connection** button to disconnect the controls that are already connected due to the declarative connection on the page. 按一下 **選擇要連接的提供者的消費者**超連結，並注意設定各種屬性的效果。Click the **Select a consumer for the provider to connect with** hyperlink, and notice the effect of setting the various properties. 如果您將滑鼠指標定位**Terminate**按鈕，自訂的說明文字會出現在工具提示。If you position your mouse pointer over the **Terminate** button, the custom description text appears in a ToolTip.

summary.span: 關閉 控制項所建立的連接使用者介面 (UI)。

span.span: Closes the connection user interface (UI) created by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在使用者按一下連接 UI 中的區域層級關閉動詞命令時呼叫。The method is called when a user clicks the zone-level close verb in the connection UI. 執行的方法時，會隱藏 UI，連線後屬性值是`null`，而且頁面仍然會在連接顯示模式。After the method executes, the connection UI is hidden, the property value is `null`, and the page remains in the connect display mode. 此時使用者可以按一下 connect 上的動詞命令控制項的動詞命令功能表中，選取控制項，或將頁面切換至另一個顯示模式。At this point users can either select a control by clicking the connect verb on the control's verbs menu, or switch the page to another display mode.

span.span: A that allows an end user to close the connection UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 關閉的動詞命令，以搭配控制項，會出現在底部 （頁尾） 連接 UI 的區域層次動詞命令。The close verb, as used with a control, is a zone-level verb that appears at the bottom (the footer) of the connection UI. 當使用者按一下的關閉動詞命令時，它會取消連線程序並關閉連接 UI，但分葉頁中的連接顯示模式。When users click the close verb, it cancels the connection process and closes the connection UI, but leaves the page in connect display mode. 此時，使用者可以傳回的頁面，即可瀏覽模式，或按一下 connect 上的動詞命令來重新開啟連接 UI 的另一個伺服器控制項。At this point, the user can either return the page to browse mode or click the connect verb on another server control to reopen the connection UI. 關閉動詞命令應該區別標頭的關閉動詞命令 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱屬性)。The close verb should be distinguished from the header close verb (for details, see the property). 這兩個動詞命令執行相同動作的關閉連接 UI，但標頭的關閉動詞命令 UI 的上方都會出現，並由超連結根據預設，而會出現在 UI 中，底部的關閉動詞命令，且以預設的按鈕。Both verbs perform the identical action of closing the connection UI, but the header close verb appears at the top of the UI and is represented by a hyperlink by default, whereas the close verb appears at the bottom of the UI, and is represented by a button by default. 使用屬性來取得對應的參考在 UI 中的物件。Use the property to get a reference to the corresponding object in the UI. 雖然屬性本身是唯讀的，有動詞命令的參考之後，您可以視需要變更其屬性值。Although the property itself is read-only, after you have a reference to the verb, you can change its property values as needed. 您可以藉由宣告，以宣告方式設定的關閉動詞命令的屬性值``內的標記項目``項目。You can set the property values of the close verb declaratively, by declaring the `` element within the tags of an `` element. 動詞命令的屬性可以宣告方式設定形式`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是屬性物件 (例如`CloseVerb-Text`)。The properties of the verb can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `CloseVerb-Text`). 您也可以設定屬性以程式設計方式在表單`Property.Subproperty`(例如`CloseVerb.Text`)。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CloseVerb.Text`). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性與控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性; 的網頁如需其他兩個程式碼所需執行此範例，請參閱範例 > 一節中的檔案類別概觀。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含郵遞區號介面和兩個的程式碼的原始程式檔控制項做為提供者和取用者連接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 網頁上裝載的所有控制項，會宣告``項目，並示範如何使用屬性，以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 網頁會宣告``項目，並在項目，它會宣告``項目和屬性，使用屬性的集合。The Web page declares an `` element, and within the element, it declares a `` element and sets a property using attributes. 此外，在`Page_PreRender`方法，將程式碼上設定屬性的關閉動詞控制項。Also, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code sets a property on the close verb for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**ZIP 程式碼提供者**控制項，然後按一下 connect 動詞命令。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 按一下 [**結束連線**中斷連線的控制項，因為在頁面上的宣告式連線已連線] 按鈕。Click the **End Connection** button to disconnect the controls that are already connected due to the declarative connection on the page. 按一下 **選擇要連接的提供者的消費者**超連結，並注意設定各種屬性的效果。Click the **Select a consumer for the provider to connect with** hyperlink, and notice the effect of setting the various properties. 如果您將滑鼠指標定位**關閉區域**按鈕底端的連接使用者介面，自訂的說明文字會出現在工具提示。If you position your mouse pointer over the **Close Zone** button at the bottom of the connection UI, the custom description text appears in a ToolTip. 請注意，在連接區域頂端的標頭關閉動詞命令由超連結，並關閉動詞命令的屬性設定不影響標頭的關閉動詞命令。Notice that the header close verb at the top of the connections zone is represented by a hyperlink, and your property assignments on the close verb have no effect on the header close verb.

value.span: .NET Framework 會提供文化特性字串做為預設標題。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性以自訂值用於連接 UI 的這一節的標題。Use the property to use a custom value for the title of this section of the connection UI. 使用者顯示具有現有連線，連接 UI，然後按一下 設定動詞命令時，會出現在 ui 的 設定連線 區段 (依預設，這由**設定**連接 UI 中的按鈕)。The Configure Connections section of the UI appears when a user has displayed the connection UI with an existing connection, and clicks the configure verb (by default, this is represented by a **Configure** button in the connection UI). 您可以藉由指定的字串，以宣告方式，設定屬性值`configureconnectiontitle`屬性上``在網頁上的標記。You can set the property value declaratively, by assigning a string to the `configureconnectiontitle` attribute on the `` tag in a Web page. 或者，您可以以程式設計方式將字串指派給屬性。Or you can assign a string to the property programmatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性與控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性; 的網頁如需其他兩個程式碼所需執行此範例，請參閱範例 > 一節中的檔案類別概觀。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含郵遞區號介面和兩個的程式碼的原始程式檔控制項做為提供者和取用者連接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 網頁上裝載的所有控制項，會宣告``項目，並示範如何以程式設計方式使用的屬性。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 網頁會宣告``項目，然後在`Page_PreRender`方法，將程式碼將值指派給屬性。The Web page declares an `` element, and in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**ZIP 程式碼提供者**控制項，然後按一下 connect 動詞命令。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 因為連線已存在，您現在會看到**結束連線** 按鈕，並**設定**按鈕，表示設定動詞命令。Because the connection already exists, you now see an **End Connection** button, and a **Configure** button, which represents the configure verb. 如果您的連線設定 （它不在此程式碼範例），**設定** 按鈕，就會啟用，您可以按一下以開啟 設定連線 區段中，標題會是值指派給的程式碼屬性。If your connection were configurable (it is not in this code example), the **Configure** button would be enabled; you could click it to open the Configure Connections section, and the title would be the value the code assigned to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連線已存在，而且使用者已開啟連接 UI 時，管理連線 區段中的連接使用者介面，會出現設定動詞命令。The configure verb appears in the Manage Connections section of the connection UI, when a connection already exists and a user has opened the connection UI. UI 會呈現使用者**結束連線**按鈕以結束連接，和**設定**設定連線 按鈕 （這表示設定動詞命令）。The UI presents users with an **End Connection** button to end the connection, and a **Configure** button (which represents the configure verb) to configure the connection. 如果使用者按下**設定**按鈕，在 ui 的 [設定連線] 區段隨即出現，讓使用者可設定的連接。If a user clicks the **Configure** button, the Configure Connections section of the UI appears, enabling users to configure the connection. 此選項可設定的連線 (因而**設定** 按鈕) 只有當連線會使用轉換程式，並轉換程式包含的組態精靈 的控制項時，才會啟用 ()，可讓它成為由使用者設定。This option to configure a connection (and hence the **Configure** button) is enabled only when the connection uses a transformer, and the transformer includes a configuration wizard control () that enables it to be configured by users. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For details, see the class. 使用屬性來取得對應的參考在 UI 中的物件。Use the property to get a reference to the corresponding object in the UI. 雖然屬性本身是唯讀的，有動詞命令的參考之後，您可以視需要變更其屬性值。Although the property itself is read-only, after you have a reference to the verb, you can change its property values as needed. 您可以藉由宣告，以宣告方式設定設定動詞命令的屬性值``內的標記項目``項目。You can set the property values of the configure verb declaratively, by declaring the `` element within the tags of an `` element. 動詞命令的屬性可以宣告方式設定形式`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是屬性物件 (例如`ConfigureVerb-Text`)。The properties of the verb can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `ConfigureVerb-Text`). 您也可以設定屬性以程式設計方式在表單`Property.Subproperty`(例如`ConfigureVerb.Text`)。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ConfigureVerb.Text`). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性與控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性; summary.span: 取得或設定連接使用者介面 (UI) 區段中所顯示的指示文字，在這個區段中使用者可以選取提供者將連接到的消費者連接點。

span.span: Gets or sets the instructional text displayed in the section of the connection user interface (UI) where users select a consumer connection point that the provider will connect to.

value.span: 字串，包含提供者如何連接到消費者之指示。

span.span: A string containing the instructions for creating a consumer connection to the provider.

value.span: .NET Framework 會提供文化特性字串做為預設文字。

span.span: The default text is a culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性在特定連線的情況下會生效。The property takes effect in a specific connection scenario. 當使用者按一下 connect 上的動詞命令提供者控制項，控制項顯示的連接可讓使用者選取消費者的 UI 部分。When a user clicks the connect verb on a provider control, the control displays a portion of the connection UI that enables users to select a consumer. 如果使用者按一下 connect 上的動詞命令的取用者，然後連接 UI 會進行反轉，並顯示相關資訊連接到提供者。If the user clicked a connect verb on the consumer, then the connection UI would do the reverse, and display information about connecting to a provider. 中的文字屬性會顯示包含可以連接的提供者提供的消費者連接點的下拉式清單控制項的正上方。The text in the property is displayed just above the drop-down list controls that contain the available consumer connection points to which a provider can be connected. 您可以使用，以宣告方式，設定此屬性`ConnectToConsumerInstructionText`屬性的開頭標記中``項目 頁面上，或者您可以透過程式設計方式設定屬性。You can set this property declaratively, by using the `ConnectToConsumerInstructionText` attribute in the opening tag of the `` element in a page, or you can set the property programmatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性與控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性; 的網頁如需其他兩個程式碼所需執行此範例，請參閱範例 > 一節中的檔案類別概觀。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含郵遞區號介面和兩個的程式碼的原始程式檔控制項做為提供者和取用者連接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 網頁上裝載的所有控制項，會宣告``項目，並示範如何以程式設計方式使用的屬性。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 網頁會宣告``項目並在`Page_PreRender`方法，將程式碼將值指派給屬性。The Web page declares an `` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**ZIP 程式碼提供者**控制項，然後按一下 connect 動詞命令。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 按一下 **結束連線**按鈕以結束連接，，然後按一下**選取與連線提供者取用者**超連結。Click the **End Connection** button to end the connection, and then click the **Select a consumer for the provider to connect with** hyperlink. 消費者連接 UI 隨即出現，並自訂文字指派給屬性會顯示具有控制項，可讓您選取的連接點上取用者與提供者連接的區域的正上方。The consumer connection UI appears, and the custom text assigned to the property appears just above the area with the control that allows you to select a connection point on the consumer for connecting with the provider.

的網頁如需其他兩個程式碼所需執行此範例，請參閱範例 > 一節中的檔案類別概觀。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含郵遞區號介面和兩個的程式碼的原始程式檔控制項做為提供者和取用者連接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 網頁上裝載的所有控制項，會宣告``項目，並示範如何以程式設計方式使用的屬性。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 網頁會宣告``項目並在`Page_PreRender`方法，將程式碼將值指派給屬性。The Web page declares an `` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**郵遞區號消費者**控制項，然後按一下 connect 動詞命令。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb. 按一下 **結束連線**按鈕以結束連接，，然後按一下**選取提供者與取用者**超連結。Click the **End Connection** button to end the connection, and then click the **Select a provider for the consumer to connect with** hyperlink. 提供者連接 UI 隨即出現，並自訂文字指派給屬性會顯示具有控制項，可讓您選取的連接點上的提供者與取用者連接的區域的正上方。The provider connection UI appears, and the custom text assigned to the property appears just above the area with the control that allows you to select a connection point on the provider for connecting with the consumer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接動詞命令，可搭配控制項，為區域層次動詞命令，會出現在連接使用者介面 (UI) 檢視的過程中哪些使用者完成兩個控制項之間的連線。The connect verb, as used with a control, is a zone-level verb that appears in the connection user interface (UI) as part of the view in which users finalize a connection between two controls. 使用者可以在其中選取連接點的使用者介面組件中是否兩個控制項都能夠連接，連接動詞命令已啟用 UI 底部附近。In the part of the UI where users can select connection points, if two controls are able to connect, the connect verb is enabled near the bottom of the UI. 使用者選取的連接點之後，他們可以按一下來建立連接的連接動詞命令。After users select a connection point, they can click the connect verb to create the connection. > [!NOTE] > 區域層級連線本主題中討論的動詞命令實際上控制項之間建立連接，而且不同於出現的動詞命令功能表的動詞命令控制項。The zone-level connect verb discussed in this topic actually establishes a connection between controls, and is different from the verb that appears on the verbs menu of a control. 當使用者切換連線顯示模式，如果控制項可以形成連線，網頁連接動詞會出現在其動詞命令功能表。When a user switches a Web page to connect display mode, if a control can form connections, a connect verb appears on its verbs menu. 這連接用的動詞命令只會開啟連接所建立的 UI控制項。This connect verb simply opens the connection UI created by the control. 相反地，在區域層級運作，本主題所述的動詞命令實際上會建立連線。In contrast, the verb discussed in this topic, which operates at the zone level, actually creates a connection. 使用屬性來取得對應的參考在 UI 中的物件。Use the property to get a reference to the corresponding object in the UI. 雖然屬性本身是唯讀的，有動詞命令的參考之後，您可以視需要變更其屬性值。Although the property itself is read-only, after you have a reference to the verb, you can change its property values as needed. 您可以藉由宣告，以宣告方式設定連接動詞命令的屬性值``的開頭和結尾標記之間的項目``項目。You can set the property values of the connect verb declaratively, by declaring the `` element between the opening and closing tags of an `` element. 動詞命令的屬性也可以設定以宣告的開頭標記內``項目，在表單中加入屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是屬性物件 (例如`ConnectVerb-Text`)。The properties of the verb can also be set declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `ConnectVerb-Text`). 您也可以設定屬性以程式設計方式在表單`Property.Subproperty`(例如`ConnectVerb.Text`)。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ConnectVerb.Text`). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性與控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性; 的網頁如需其他兩個程式碼所需執行此範例，請參閱範例 > 一節中的檔案類別概觀。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含郵遞區號介面和兩個的程式碼的原始程式檔控制項做為提供者和取用者連接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 網頁上裝載的所有控制項，會宣告``項目，並示範如何使用屬性，以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 網頁會宣告``項目並在其宣告中項目標記，``項目，並設定一些使用屬性的屬性。The Web page declares an `` element and, within the element tags, it declares a `` element and sets some properties using attributes. 此外，在`Page_PreRender`方法中，程式碼會設定某些屬性上的 connect 動詞控制項。Also, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code sets some properties on the connect verb for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**ZIP 程式碼提供者**控制項，然後按一下 connect 動詞命令。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 按一下 [**結束連線**中斷連線的控制項，因為在頁面上的宣告式連線已連線] 按鈕。Click the **End Connection** button to disconnect the controls that are already connected due to the declarative connection on the page. 按一下 **選擇要連接的提供者的消費者**超連結，並注意設定各種屬性的效果。Click the **Select a consumer for the provider to connect with** hyperlink, and notice the effect of setting the various properties. 如果您將滑鼠指標定位**連接控制項**按鈕，自訂的說明文字會出現在工具提示。If you position your mouse pointer over the **Connect Controls** button, the custom description text appears in a ToolTip.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性在特定連線的情況下會生效。The property takes effect in a specific connection scenario. 當使用者按一下 connect 上的動詞命令提供者控制項，並連線已存在，控制項顯示的檢視，可讓使用者中斷連線。When a user clicks the connect verb on a provider control, and a connection already exists, the control displays a view that enables users to disconnect the connection. 檢視也會顯示任何參與連接的取用者。The view also shows any consumers participating in the connection. 正上方的取用者清單是描述的取用者的指示文字，其預設值是描述的多個消費者控制項連接中執行工作。Just above the list of consumers is the consumers instruction text, which by default is more of a description of what consumer controls do in a connection. 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式``項目，加入名為屬性`ConsumersInstructionText`並將它指派值。You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute named `ConsumersInstructionText` and assigning it a value. 您也可以以程式設計方式設定屬性值。You can also set the property value programmatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性與控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性; 的網頁如需其他兩個程式碼所需執行此範例，請參閱範例 > 一節中的檔案類別概觀。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含郵遞區號介面和兩個的程式碼的原始程式檔控制項做為提供者和取用者連接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 網頁上裝載的所有控制項，會宣告``項目，並示範如何以程式設計方式使用的屬性。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 網頁會宣告``項目並在`Page_PreRender`方法，將程式碼將值指派給屬性。The Web page declares an `` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**ZIP 程式碼提供者**控制項，然後按一下 connect 動詞命令。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 在檢視中開啟現有的連接，尋找指派給自訂文字的取用者中屬性。In the view that opens for the existing connection, look in the consumers section for the custom text assigned to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫基底方法。This method overrides the base method. 它會準備連接所需的所有與連接相關的物件 （例如，它會擷取連接點物件從提供的消費者和提供者控制項），並建立與使用者互動的各種使用者介面 (UI) 控制項UI 來建立連線的連線。It prepares all connection-related objects needed for connections (for example, it retrieves the connection point objects from the available consumer and provider controls), and it creates the various user interface (UI) controls that users interact with in the connection UI to establish a connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中斷連接動詞命令，可搭配控制，會出現在連接使用者介面 (UI) 檢視的過程中哪些使用者管理現有的連接兩個控制項之間的區域層次動詞命令。The disconnect verb, as used with a control, is a zone-level verb that appears in the connection user interface (UI) as part of the view in which users manage an existing connection between two controls. 使用者已按下之後連接控制項的動詞命令功能表上的動詞命令和 UI 出現後，如果已經有兩個控制項之間連接的連接，啟動 UI 底部附近出現中斷連接的動詞命令。After users have clicked the connect verb on the verbs menu of a control, and the connection UI appears, if there is already a connection between two controls, the disconnect verb appears activated near the bottom of the UI. 使用屬性來取得對應的參考在 UI 中的物件。Use the property to get a reference to the corresponding object in the UI. 雖然屬性本身是唯讀的，有動詞命令的參考之後，您可以視需要變更其屬性值。Although the property itself is read-only, after you have a reference to the verb, you can change its property values as needed. 您可以藉由宣告，以宣告方式，設定中斷連線的動詞命令的屬性值``的開頭和結尾標記之間的項目``項目。You can set the property values of the disconnect verb declaratively, by declaring the `` element between the opening and closing tags of an `` element. 動詞命令的屬性也可以設定以宣告的開頭標記內``項目，在表單中加入屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是屬性物件 (例如`DisconnectVerb-Text`)。The properties of the verb can also be set declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `DisconnectVerb-Text`). 您也可以設定屬性以程式設計方式在表單`Property.Subproperty`(例如`DisconnectVerb.Text`)。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `DisconnectVerb.Text`). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性與控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性; 的網頁如需其他兩個程式碼所需執行此範例，請參閱範例 > 一節中的檔案類別概觀。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含郵遞區號介面和兩個的程式碼的原始程式檔控制項做為提供者和取用者連接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 網頁上裝載的所有控制項，會宣告``項目，並示範如何使用屬性，以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 網頁會宣告``項目和項目的標記內宣告``項目，並設定一些使用屬性的屬性。The Web page declares an `` element and, within the element tags, declares a `` element and sets some properties using attributes. 此外，在`Page_PreRender`方法中，程式碼會設定某些屬性上的中斷連線動詞控制項。Also, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code sets some properties on the disconnect verb for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**ZIP 程式碼提供者**控制項，然後按一下 connect 動詞命令。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 請注意中斷連接的動詞命令設定的屬性值的效果。Note the effect of the property values that were set on the disconnect verb. 如果您將滑鼠指標定位**結束連線**按鈕，自訂的說明文字會出現在工具提示。If you position your mouse pointer over the **End Connection** button, the custom description text appears in a ToolTip. 按一下 [**結束連線**中斷連線的控制項，因為在頁面上的宣告式連線已連線] 按鈕。Click the **End Connection** button to disconnect the controls that are already connected due to the declarative connection on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性在特定連線的情況下會生效。The property takes effect in a specific connection scenario. 當使用者按一下 connect 上的動詞命令的消費者控制項，控制項顯示的檢視，可讓使用者連接到提供者。When a user clicks the connect verb on a consumer control, the control displays a view that enables users to establish a connection to a provider. 在點指示使用者選擇的提供者連接的使用者介面部分，有一些將參與連接之具名的消費者之前的文字。In the part of the UI that instructs users to choose a provider connection point, there is some text that precedes the named consumer that will participate in the connection. 此文字前面的取用者是中的文字屬性。This text that precedes the consumer is the text in the property. 根據預設，此文字值是**取得**。By default, the text value is **Get**. 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式``項目，加入名為屬性`GetText`並將它指派值。You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute named `GetText` and assigning it a value. 您也可以以程式設計方式設定屬性值。You can also set the property value programmatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性與控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性; 的網頁如需其他兩個程式碼所需執行此範例，請參閱範例 > 一節中的檔案類別概觀。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含郵遞區號介面和兩個的程式碼的原始程式檔控制項做為提供者和取用者連接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 網頁上裝載的所有控制項，會宣告``項目，並示範如何以程式設計方式使用的屬性。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 網頁會宣告``項目並在`Page_PreRender`方法，將程式碼將值指派給屬性。The Web page declares an `` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**郵遞區號消費者**控制項，然後按一下 connect 動詞命令。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb. 在開啟的現有連接的檢視，查看具名的消費者之前的文字，提供者區段。In the view that opens for the existing connection, look in the providers section for the text that precedes the named consumer. 這是指派給文字屬性。This is the text assigned to the property.

[!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**郵遞區號消費者**控制項，然後按一下 connect 動詞命令。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb. 在檢視中開啟現有的連接，請注意，在連接區域頂端的標頭文字的值指派給程式碼範例中的屬性。In the view that opens for the existing connection, note that the header text at the top of the connections zone is the value assigned to the property in the code example.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中包含的文字UI 會顯示連線和連線已存在時，會顯示屬性。The text contained in the property is visible whenever the connection UI is displayed and a connection already exists. 標頭文字的正下方 (包含在屬性)，位於頂端的 連接 UI，指示標題，而正下方的指示文字。Just below the header text (contained in the property), which is found at the top of the connection UI, is the instruction title, and just below that is the instruction text. 指示文字會通知使用者可以執行的動作類型在目前所選（選取的控制項是使用者按下控制項的動詞命令功能表上的連接動詞命令） 的控制項。The instruction text informs users what type of action can be performed on the currently selected control (the selected control is the one for which the user clicked a connect verb on the control's verbs menu). 根據預設，會指示文字**管理目前的 Web 組件連線**。By default, the instruction text is **Manage the connections for the current Web part**. 此屬性會覆寫基底屬性從類別，以便預設連線區域文字可以指派給屬性的指示。This property overrides the base property from the class, so that the default connections zone instruction text can be assigned to the property. 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式``項目，加入名為屬性`InstructionText`並將它指派值。You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute named `InstructionText` and assigning it a value. 您也可以以程式設計方式設定屬性值。You can also set the property value programmatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性與控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性; [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**郵遞區號消費者**控制項，然後按一下 connect 動詞命令。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb. 在檢視中開啟現有的連接，請注意，連接區域頂端附近的指示文字的值指派給程式碼範例中的屬性。In the view that opens for the existing connection, note that the instruction text near the top of the connections zone is the value assigned to the property in the code example.

summary.span: 取得或設定文字，在管理現有連接的連接使用者介面 (UI) 中，對消費者或提供者控制項可執行之動作的一般描述會使用此文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is used for a general description of the action that can be performed on the consumer or provider control, within the connection user interface (UI) for managing existing connections.

value.span: 字串，包含連接 UI 的指示標題。

span.span: A string that contains the instruction title for the connection UI.

value.span: .NET Framework 會提供文化特性字串做為預設文字。

span.span: The default text is a culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中包含的文字UI 會顯示連線和連線已存在時，會顯示屬性。The text contained in the property is visible whenever the connection UI is displayed and a connection already exists. 指示標題文字是正下方的標頭文字 (包含在屬性)，其位在連接 UI 的頂端。The instruction title text is just below the header text (contained in the property), which is found at the top of the connection UI. 指示標題是一般的描述，可以通知使用者可以取用者或提供者上執行的動作類型參與的現有連接的控制項。The instruction title is a general description that informs users what type of action can be performed on the consumer or provider control that is participating in an existing connection. 根據預設，指示標題開頭**管理的連線**，而結尾依序按一下 connect 上的動詞命令及其動詞命令功能表中選取的使用者取用者或提供者控制項的名稱。By default, the instruction title begins with **Manage the connections for**, and ends with the name of the consumer or provider control that the user selected by clicking the connect verb on its verbs menu. > [!NOTE] > 當您將自訂值指派給這個屬性時，請記住使用者會選取要管理的連接，因此自訂指示標題必須通常不足以取用者或提取要求，請參閱提供者或消費者控制項是否無法知道您在設計階段ovider 控制項。When you assign a custom value to this property, remember that you cannot know at design time whether the user will select a provider or consumer control on which to manage the connection, so the custom instruction title must be general enough to refer to a consumer or a provider control. 相反地，屬性的預設值被轉譯的方式，動態附加使用者選取任何取用者或提供者控制項的名稱。In contrast, the default value of the property is rendered in such a way that it dynamically appends the name of whatever consumer or provider control that the user selects. 如果您想要提供自訂值的屬性，以模擬此行為，您必須繼承自類別，並覆寫這個屬性或方法。If you want to supply a custom value for the property that mimics this behavior, you must inherit from the class, and override this property or the method. 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式``項目，加入名為屬性`InstructionTitle`並將它指派值。You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute named `InstructionTitle` and assigning it a value. 您也可以以程式設計方式設定屬性值。You can also set the property value programmatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性與控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性; 的網頁如需其他兩個程式碼所需執行此範例，請參閱範例 > 一節中的檔案類別概觀。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含郵遞區號介面和兩個的程式碼的原始程式檔控制項做為提供者和取用者連接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 網頁上裝載的所有控制項，會宣告``項目，並示範如何以程式設計方式使用的屬性。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 網頁會宣告``項目並在`Page_PreRender`方法，將程式碼將值指派給屬性。The Web page declares an `` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**郵遞區號消費者**控制項，然後按一下 connect 動詞命令。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb. 在檢視中開啟現有的連接，請注意，標頭文字，連接區域中，頂端附近的正下方的指示標題的值指派給程式碼範例中的屬性。In the view that opens for the existing connection, note that the instruction title just below the header text, near the top of the connections zone, is the value assigned to the property in the code example.

summary.span: 從 方法所儲存的先前頁面要求來還原檢視狀態資訊。

span.span: Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定的自訂伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 叫用這個方法時，它會判斷是否檢視狀態先前儲存的控制項，則如果是的話，設定檢視狀態的已儲存的值。When this method is invoked, it determines whether view state was previously saved for the control and, if so, sets the view state to the saved value. 方法會覆寫方法繼承自類別，以便讓它可以加入基底實作，並還原中使用的數個區域層級動詞命令的狀態控制項。The method overrides the method inherited from the class, so that it can add to the base implementation and restore state for the several zone-level verbs used in the control.

exception.span: 的長度不等於 方法所建立的陣列長度。

span.span: The length of does not equal the length of the array created by the method.

summary.span: 當 Web 組件控制項沒有現有連接時，取得或設定在連接使用者介面 (UI) 主體中出現的指示文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the instruction text that appears in the body of the connection user interface (UI) when a Web Parts control has no existing connection.

value.span: 在沒有現有連接的狀況下，包含文字訊息的字串。

value.span: .NET Framework 會提供文化特性字串做為預設文字。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中包含的文字UI 會顯示連接，而且沒有連接存在時，會顯示屬性。The text contained in the property is visible whenever the connection UI is displayed and no connection exists. 使用者會切換成連接顯示模式的頁面，並按一下的動詞命令功能表上的 connect 動詞命令之後控制項，UI 會顯示主要的連線。After a user switches a page into connect display mode and clicks a connect verb on the verbs menu of a control, the main connection UI is displayed. 如果沒有目前的連線，從文字靠近底部的關閉動詞命令，在該區域的頁尾區域的正上方的連接 UI 中，顯示屬性。If there is no current connection, the text from the property is displayed near the bottom of the connection UI, just above the close verb in the zone's footer area. 文字描述的事實，沒有任何現有的連線，並可讓使用者建立使用者介面內連線的基本指示。The text describes the fact that there are no existing connections and gives users basic instructions for creating a connection within the UI. 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式``項目，加入名為屬性`NoExistingConnectionInstructionText`並將它指派值。You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute named `NoExistingConnectionInstructionText` and assigning it a value. 您也可以以程式設計方式設定屬性值。You can also set the property value programmatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性與控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性; 的網頁如需其他兩個程式碼所需執行此範例，請參閱範例 > 一節中的檔案類別概觀。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含郵遞區號介面和兩個的程式碼的原始程式檔控制項做為提供者和取用者連接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 網頁上裝載的所有控制項，會宣告``項目，並示範如何以程式設計方式使用的屬性。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 網頁會宣告``項目並在`Page_PreRender`方法，將程式碼將值指派給屬性。The Web page declares an `` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**郵遞區號消費者**控制項，然後按一下 connect 動詞命令。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb. 在檢視中開啟現有的連接，按一下**結束連線** 按鈕。In the view that opens for the existing connection, click the **End Connection** button. 請注意，連接 UI，關閉的動詞命令，在該區域的頁尾區域的正上方的底部附近出現的任何現有連線的指示文字。Note that the instruction text for no existing connections appears near the bottom of the connection UI, just above the close verb in the zone's footer area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會引發事件，並提供自訂處理常式。This method raises the event and provides a custom handler for it. 網頁進入或離開連接顯示模式之後，這個方法會執行幾個步驟的唯一控制項。After a Web page enters or exits the connect display mode, this method carries out several steps unique to the control. 方法會取消任何連接活動目前處於暫止狀態，確保沒有任何子控制項，從連接使用者介面 (UI) 會顯示藉由設定屬性設`false`，並設定連接 UI 中的模式如果使用者會繼續進行建立連接的程序時，就可以顯示現有的連線資訊。The method cancels any connection activity that is pending at this point, ensures that no child controls from the connection user interface (UI) are displayed by setting the property to `false`, and sets the connection UI to a mode in which it can display information about existing connections, if a user proceeds with the process of creating a connection. 若要將特製化的處理新增至中提供的處理方法，開發人員可以繼承自類別並覆寫這個方法。To add specialized handling to the handling provided in the method, developers can inherit from the class and override this method. 另外，開發人員也可以提供的處理常式上的事件控制項，加上`OnDisplayModeChanged`屬性設定為``在網頁上，並將自訂的方法來處理事件的值指派給它的項目。As an alternative, developers can also provide a handler for the event on the control by adding an `OnDisplayModeChanged` attribute to the `` element in a Web page, and assigning to it the value of a custom method to handle the event. 在這種方法，開發人員可以檢查目前的值屬性，以及它是否正在，它們可以執行所需的變更，以控制項。In this method, developers can check the current value of the property, and if it is , they can carry out the desired changes to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫為的事實，就必須重新建立的子控制項重設連接使用者介面 (UI) 的實作。This method overrides the implementation to reset the connection user interface (UI) for the fact that the child controls will have to be recreated. 這是必要的因為當選取的控制項變更時，將會變更 UI，連接中的數個選項根據選取的控制項是否取用者或提供者的連接點之控制項具有 （連接點會列在下拉式清單控制項），以及其他詳細資料。This is necessary because, when the selected control changes, several options in the connection UI will change, depending on whether the selected control is a consumer or provider, what connection points the controls has (the connection points are listed in drop-down list controls), and other details.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性在特定連線的情況下會生效。The property takes effect in a specific connection scenario. 當使用者按一下 connect 上的動詞命令的消費者控制項，並連線已存在，控制項顯示的檢視，可讓使用者中斷連線。When a user clicks the connect verb on a consumer control, and a connection already exists, the control displays a view that enables users to disconnect the connection. 檢視也會顯示任何參與連接的提供者。The view also shows any providers participating in the connection. 提供者清單的正上方是描述的提供者指示文字，其預設值是描述的多個提供者控制項連接中執行工作。Just above the list of providers is the providers instruction text, which by default is more of a description of what provider controls do in a connection. 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式``項目，加入名為屬性`ProvidersInstructionText`並將它指派值。You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute named `ProvidersInstructionText` and assigning it a value. 您也可以以程式設計方式設定屬性值。You can also set the property value programmatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性與控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性; 的網頁如需其他兩個程式碼所需執行此範例，請參閱範例 > 一節中的檔案類別概觀。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含郵遞區號介面和兩個的程式碼的原始程式檔控制項做為提供者和取用者連接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 網頁上裝載的所有控制項，會宣告``項目，並示範如何以程式設計方式使用的屬性。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 網頁會宣告``項目並在`Page_PreRender`方法，將程式碼將值指派給屬性。The Web page declares an `` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**郵遞區號消費者**控制項，然後按一下 connect 動詞命令。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb. 在開啟的現有連接的檢視，查看指派給自訂文字，提供者區段屬性。In the view that opens for the existing connection, look in the providers section for the custom text assigned to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性在特定連線的情況下會生效。The property takes effect in a specific connection scenario. 當使用者按一下 connect 上的動詞命令的消費者控制項，並連線已存在，控制項顯示的檢視，可讓使用者中斷連線。When a user clicks the connect verb on a consumer control, and a connection already exists, the control displays a view that enables users to disconnect the connection. 檢視也會顯示任何參與連接的提供者。The view also shows any providers participating in the connection. 只清單上方的提供者是提供者指示文字，其上方的提供者 區段中，標題為其屬性提供的文字。Just above the list of providers is the providers instruction text, and above that is the title of the providers section, for which the property supplies the text. 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式``項目，加入名為屬性`ProvidersTitle`並將它指派值。You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute named `ProvidersTitle` and assigning it a value. 您也可以以程式設計方式設定屬性值。You can also set the property value programmatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性與控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性; 的網頁如需其他兩個程式碼所需執行此範例，請參閱範例 > 一節中的檔案類別概觀。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 包含郵遞區號介面和兩個的程式碼的原始程式檔控制項做為提供者和取用者連接。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 取得這個程式碼從類別概觀。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 網頁上裝載的所有控制項，會宣告``項目，並示範如何以程式設計方式使用的屬性。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 網頁會宣告``項目並在`Page_PreRender`方法，將程式碼將值指派給屬性。The Web page declares an `` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**郵遞區號消費者**控制項，然後按一下 connect 動詞命令。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb. 在開啟的現有連接的檢視，查看指派給自訂文字，提供者區段屬性。In the view that opens for the existing connection, look in the providers section for the custom text assigned to the property.

summary.span: 引發 控制項的事件，當包含此控制項的表單回傳至伺服器之時。

span.span: Raises an event for the control when the form that contains it posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會處理當表單，其中包含可能會發生數個可能的結果控制項回傳至伺服器。The method handles the several possible outcomes that can occur when a form containing a control is posted back to the server. 首先，如果值屬性是`null`，沒有任何進一步連線相關的動作，若要充分，因此任何暫止的連接已取消，且此方法傳回。First, if the value of the property is `null`, there is no further connections-related action to take, so any pending connections are canceled and the method returns. 其次，如果連接使用者介面 (UI) 是可以實際看見，而且使用者正在建立連線，此方法會處理可能的案例： 使用者已按下連接動詞命令，使用者按一下 中斷連接的動詞命令，UI 正在轉換程式顯示，正在關閉區域、 建立提供者的連線時，或正在建立取用者的連接。Second, if the connection user interface (UI) is actually visible and the user is in the process of creating a connection, the method handles the possible scenarios: the user clicked a connect verb, the user clicked a disconnect verb, the transformer UI is being displayed, the zone is being closed, a connection to a provider is being created, or a connection to a consumer is being created. 在每個案例中，方法會採用`eventArgument`傳遞的參數和更新據以控制。In each case, the method takes the `eventArgument` parameter being passed and updates the control accordingly. 最後，如果上述所有情況下都不適用，方法會呼叫基底方法類別。Finally, if none of the above cases apply, the method calls the base method in the class.

span.span: Sends the content of a control's body area to the specified object, which writes the content to the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件控制項的主體為其頁首和頁尾區域之間的部分。The body of a Web Parts control is the portion between its header and footer areas. 方法會覆寫的由基底的主體區域呈現方法。The method overrides the rendering of the body region that is done by the base method. 此方法會將轉譯唯一的樣式屬性套用至基底控制項，以及它也會呈現適當的內容子系控制項，在連接使用者介面 (UI)，根據先前在 UI 中的使用者所做的選取項目。This method adds to the base rendering unique style attributes that apply to a control, and it also renders the appropriate content for the child controls in the connection user interface (UI), based on previous selections made by a user in the UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控制項是顯示在任何模式，會顯示現有的連線詳細資料，但其模式，以及是否有與其建立關聯的連線詳細資料的控制項狀態資料方法會使可保存，將儲存資料跨伺服器的來回行程。If a control is visible in any of its modes except the mode that displays existing connections details, and if it has control state data about connection details associated with it, the method saves the data so that it can be persisted across round trips to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視狀態是 Web 組件控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of a Web Parts control's properties. 這些值會自動放入控制項屬性，這是執行個體的類別。These values are automatically placed in the control's property, which is an instance of the class. 儲存狀態的控制項的生命週期的階段之後，這個屬性的值然後會保存到字串物件。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the control's life cycle. 方法基底實作會將儲存在各種動詞命令的檢視狀態的能力控制項。The method adds to the base implementation the ability to save view state for the various verbs in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性在特定連線的情況下會生效。The property takes effect in a specific connection scenario. 當使用者按一下 connect 上的動詞命令提供者控制項，控制項顯示的檢視，可讓使用者建立的取用者的連線。When a user clicks the connect verb on a provider control, the control displays a view that enables users to establish a connection to a consumer. 在點會指示使用者選擇取用者連接的使用者介面部分，有一些之前將參與連接的具名提供者的文字。In the part of the UI that instructs users to choose a consumer connection point, there is some text that precedes the named provider that will participate in the connection. 此提供者之前的文字是中的文字屬性。This text that precedes the provider is the text in the property. 根據預設，此文字值是**傳送**。By default, the text value is **Send**. 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式``項目，加入名為屬性`SendText`並將它指派值。You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute named `SendText` and assigning it a value. 您也可以以程式設計方式設定屬性值。You can also set the property value programmatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性在特定連線的情況下會生效。The property takes effect in a specific connection scenario. 當使用者按一下 connect 上的動詞命令提供者控制項，控制項顯示的檢視，可讓使用者建立的取用者的連線。When a user clicks the connect verb on a provider control, the control displays a view that enables users to establish a connection to a consumer. 在點會指示使用者選擇取用者連接的使用者介面部分，有一些可讓使用者選取的提供者將傳送至其資料的連接點的下拉式清單控制項之前的文字。In the part of the UI that instructs users to choose a consumer connection point, there is some text that precedes the drop-down list control in which users can select which connection point the provider will send its data to. 此下拉式清單控制項之前的文字是中的文字屬性。This text that precedes the drop-down control is the text in the property. 根據預設，此文字值是**至**。By default, the text value is **To**. 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式``項目，加入名為屬性`SendToText`並將它指派值。You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute named `SendToText` and assigning it a value. 您也可以以程式設計方式設定屬性值。You can also set the property value programmatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者的網頁會切換至連接的顯示模式，位置，然後按一下 connect 上的動詞命令的動詞命令功能表啟用針對連接、 連接使用者介面 (UI) 隨即開啟和控制項的控制項現在由參考屬性。When a user switches a Web page into connect display mode, and clicks the connect verb on the verbs menu of a control that is enabled for connections, the connection user interface (UI) opens, and the control is now referenced by the property. > [!NOTE] > 所參考的控制項屬性會取得它的值從屬性與目前物件。The control referenced by the property gets its value from the property of the current object.
